title: Codelco Achieves Copper Growth Goal — by Slimmest of Margins
description: Codelco Chairman Máximo Pacheco is meeting his goal of raising production at the state-owned copper giant — though only just.
content: Codelco Chairman Máximo Pacheco is meeting his goal of raising production at the state-owned copper giant — though only just.
